title: Somethings i have learned
body:
Some tricks that may help some people

{{champion:41}} when you upgrade to raise moral.. it resets your ult. so.. before you upgrade pop that ult. then if you want ult again.
{{item:3512}}  the thing you spawn wont go away. so .. late game.. sell your boots. buy one. drop the little bugger down. run back to the nexus and buy your boots back after you sell the rot

this {{item:2420}} and this {{item:3157}} are on 2 different cool downs with a disclaimer. 
{{item:2420}} can only be used 1 time a game. so if you never used it and upgraded to the next item.. just buy one to use the active. yes, you can stop watch then zhonya right after one another or vise versa. when stop watch is used... it is done for the game. so if you never used it.. double golden statue for you

{{item:3513}} if someone is starting to lay this down.. you can interrupt them .. thus killing off rift herald before he even spawns. 

{{item:3060}} is great to siege when the enemies wave clear is nothing but AP damage. you cant clear what you cant hurt. this makes 1 minion immune to AP damage.

ARAM is annoying because people literally have ARAM accounts. they have selected champions that are high win rate in that battle mode.  Fear not summoners.. ARAM has its own elo so they normally go on winning streaks and just deal with other people with ARAM accounts. still annoying.

Supports spike in power before the carries. If you support gets a kill it is better for the team in early game. dont think you needed to get everything. (Translation. Support items are cheaper and more effective in early to mid game.)

hopefully you learned something.. and for god sakes put down a ward.  I am not on my home computer and i am running off +200 ping. i have dropped a bit in elo.. so give me some help.  your kindly friendly support main. 
{{item:2055}} <-- these arnt free, but they last forever.
